verses.verse: Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> <S%H5012>Prophesy<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to those <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H1945>"Woe,<s%> <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H7462>feeding<s%> themselves! Should not the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%>?

"You <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> and <S%H3847>clothe<s%> <S%H3847>yourselves<s%> with the <S%H6785>wool,<s%> you <S%H2076>slaughter<s%> the <S%H1277>fat<s%> [sheep] <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H7462>feeding<s%> the <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

"Those who are <S%H2470>sickly<s%> you have not <S%H2388>strengthened,<s%> the <S%H2470>diseased<s%> you have not <S%H7495>healed,<s%> the <S%H7665>broken<s%> you have not <S%H2280>bound<s%> up, the <S%H5080>scattered<s%> you have not <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> have you <S%H1245>sought<s%> for the lost; but with <S%H6>force<s%> and with <S%H2394>severity<s%> you have <S%H6531>dominated<s%> them.

"And they were <S%H6327>scattered<s%> for <S%H1097>lack<s%> of a <S%H7462>shepherd,<s%> and they <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H402>food<s%> for <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> and were <S%H6327>scattered.<s%>

"My <S%H6629>flock<s%> <S%H7686>wandered<s%> through <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and on <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill,<s%> and My <S%H6629>flock<s%> was <S%H6327>scattered<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to <S%H1875>search<s%> or <S%H1245>seek<s%> [for them.]"' "
<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> you <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the Lord: <S%H3068><s%>

"As I <S%H2416>live,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H518>"surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> My <S%H6629>flock<s%> has <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H957>prey,<s%> My <S%H6629>flock<s%> has even <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H402>food<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> for <S%H369>lack<s%> of a <S%H7462>shepherd,<s%> and My <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> did not <S%H1875>search<s%> for My <S%H6629>flock,<s%> but [rather] the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H7462>fed<s%> themselves and did not <S%H7462>feed<s%> My <S%H6629>flock;<s%>
<S%H3651>therefore,<s%> you <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the Lord: <S%H3068><s%>

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> and I shall <S%H1875>demand<s%> My <S%H6629>sheep<s%> from them and make them <S%H7673>cease<s%> from <S%H7462>feeding<s%> <S%H6629>sheep.<s%> So the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> will not <S%H7462>feed<s%> themselves <S%H5750>anymore,<s%> but I shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> My <S%H6629>flock<s%> from their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> that they may not be <S%H402>food<s%> for them."' "

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I <S%H589>Myself<s%> will <S%H1875>search<s%> for My <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1239>seek<s%> them out.

"As a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> <S%H1243>cares<s%> for his <S%H5739>herd<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when he is <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H6567>scattered<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> I will <S%H1239>care<s%> for My <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4725>places<s%> to <S%H834>which<s%> they were <S%H6327>scattered<s%> on a <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> and <S%H6205>gloomy<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

"And I will <S%H3318>bring<s%> them out from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> them from the <S%H776>countries<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> them to their own <S%H127>land;<s%> and I will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> by the <S%H650>streams,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4186>inhabited<s%> <S%H4186>places<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

"I will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them in a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H4829>pasture,<s%> and their <S%H5116>grazing<s%> <S%H5116>ground<s%> will be on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H4791>heights<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> <S%H8033>There<s%> they will <S%H7257>lie<s%> <S%H7257>down<s%> in <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5116>grazing<s%> <S%H5116>ground,<s%> and they will <S%H7462>feed<s%> in <S%H8082>rich<s%> <S%H4829>pasture<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
"I will <S%H7462>feed<s%> My <S%H6629>flock<s%> and I will <S%H7257>lead<s%> them to <S%H7257>rest,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> the lost, <S%H6>bring<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H7725>scattered,<s%> <S%H5080>bind<s%> up the <S%H2280>broken,<s%> and <S%H7665>strengthen<s%> the <S%H2388>sick;<s%> but the <S%H2470>fat<s%> and the <S%H8082>strong<s%> I will <S%H2389>destroy.<s%> I will <S%H8045>feed<s%> them with <S%H7462>judgment.<s%>

"And as for you, My <S%H6629>flock,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> one <S%H7716>sheep<s%> and <S%H7716>another,<s%> between the <S%H352>rams<s%> and the <S%H6260>male<s%> <S%H6260>goats.<s%>

'Is it <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H4592>slight<s%> a <S%H4592>thing<s%> for you that you should <S%H7462>feed<s%> in the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H4829>pasture,<s%> that you must <S%H7429>tread<s%> <S%H7429>down<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet<s%> the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of your <S%H4829>pastures<s%>? Or that you should <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4950>clear<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> that you must <S%H7511>foul<s%> the <S%H3498>rest<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet<s%>?

'And as for My <S%H6629>flock,<s%> they must <S%H7462>eat<s%> <S%H4823>what<s%> you <S%H4823>tread<s%> <S%H4823>down<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and they must <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4833>what<s%> you <S%H4833>foul<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet!<s%>' "

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> to them, <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I, even I, will <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H7716>sheep<s%> and the <S%H7330>lean<s%> <S%H7716>sheep.<s%>

<S%H3282>"Because<s%> you <S%H1920>push<s%> with <S%H6654>side<s%> and with <S%H3802>shoulder,<s%> and <S%H1920>thrust<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2470>weak<s%> with your <S%H7161>horns,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them <S%H2351>abroad,<s%>

therefore, I will <S%H3467>deliver<s%> My <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and they will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> be a <S%H957>prey;<s%> and I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> one <S%H7716>sheep<s%> and <S%H7716>another.<s%>

"Then I will <S%H6965>set<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd,<s%> My <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and he will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them; he will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them <S%H1931>himself<s%> and be their <S%H7462>shepherd.<s%>

"And I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> will be their <S%H430>God,<s%> and My <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> will be <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them; I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

"And I will <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> with them and <S%H7673>eliminate<s%> <S%H7451>harmful<s%> <S%H9130>beasts<s%> from the <S%H776>land,<s%> so that they may <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H983>securely<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and <S%H3462>sleep<s%> in the <S%H3293>woods.<s%>

"And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> them and the <S%H5439>places<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> My <S%H1389>hill<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing.<s%> And I will cause <S%H1653>showers<s%> to <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> in their <S%H6256>season;<s%> they will be <S%H1653>showers<s%> of <S%H1293>blessing.<s%>

"Also the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> will <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> will <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H2981>increase,<s%> and they will be <S%H983>secure<s%> on their <S%H127>land.<s%> Then they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> when I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4133>bars<s%> of their <S%H5923>yoke<s%> and have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those who <S%H5647>enslaved<s%> them.

"And they will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> be a <S%H957>prey<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> will not <S%H398>devour<s%> them; but they will <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H983>securely,<s%> and <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> will <S%H2729>make<s%> [them] <S%H2729>afraid.<s%>

"And I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> for them a <S%H8034>renowned<s%> <S%H4302>planting<s%> <S%H4302>place,<s%> and they will not <S%H5750>again<s%> be <S%H622>victims<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and they will not <S%H5375>endure<s%> the <S%H3639>insults<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5750>anymore.<s%>

"Then they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> am with them, and that they, the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> are My <S%H5971>people,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"As for you, My <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of My <S%H4830>pasture,<s%> you are <S%H120>men,<s%> and I am your <S%H430>God,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>
